item.title: BRAZILIAN Video Editor Needed for a Crime YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor for the following crime channel

(https://www.youtube.com/@CrimeDynastyTwisted

MUST BE ABLE TO SPEAK BRASILIAN/ PORTUGUESE

The videos will need to be in the same style as the channel above

- Videos will be 10-15 minutes long
- Voice over and script will be provided. All visuals will have to be sourced yourself, but we'll give clips
- Need 2-3 a week

We're looking for someone with the following requirements:
Fast turnaround time 24-48 hours
Fast response times on text
Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 22, 2024 22:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Ireland
click to apply

item.title: AI video creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative AI Video Creator to join our team for a temporary 4-week project. The primary responsibility of this role is to take existing human-made videos and transform them using AI software such as MidJourney and other relevant tools. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for leveraging AI technology to enhance visual content.

Key Responsibilities:

Transform old human-made videos into AI-enhanced versions using software such as MidJourney and other AI tools.
Collaborate with the team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality video content.
Ensure all videos meet the specified guidelines and standards.
Edit and optimize videos for various platforms and formats.
Maintain an organized workflow and manage project timelines effectively.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing and production.
Proficiency in AI video creation tools such as MidJourney or similar software.
Strong understanding of video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.
Excellent attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 22:50 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Brand Identity & Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Brand Identity & Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Concert Videographer for Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer to edit concert video footage. The ideal candidate should have experience in capturing and editing live performances, ensuring that the final video captures the energy and atmosphere of the concert. Attention to detail and the ability to work with different styles of music are essential. The videographer should possess strong editing skills and be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Additionally, good communication skills and the ability to work within tight deadlines are crucial for this project.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Video editing
- Live performance capturing
- Attention to detail
- Strong editing skills

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 22:19 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
